GS,Goldman Sachs CEO Blankfein sees slight pay cut in 2016 Goldman Sachs Group Inc Chief Executive Lloyd Blankfein saw his overall compensation fall slightly, reflecting lower revenues at the bank in the first half of 2016. ~UPDATE 2-Goldman Sachs CEO Blankfein sees slight pay cut in 2016 March 17 Goldman Sachs Group Inc Chief Executive Lloyd Blankfein saw his overall compensation fall slightly, reflecting lower revenues at the bank in the first half of 2016. ~Goldman Sachs CEO paid $22 mln in 2016 March 17 Goldman Sachs Group Inc Chief Executive Lloyd Blankfein was paid $22 million in total compensation in 2016, according to a regulatory filing.    Blankfein was paid about $23 million in salary and bonuses in 2015. (http://bit.ly/2man1Ek)    Chief Financial Officer Harvey Schwartz received a total compensation of $20 million in 2016, compared with $21 million a year earlier.   (Reporting by Nikhil Subba in Bengaluru; Editing by Anil D'Silva) ~
